Each year, the Cloverdale Fairgrounds plays host to the Cloverdale Rodeo. Cloverdale is also home to the BC Vintage Truck Museum and Heritage Rail. Attractions in the area include the Fraser Downs Racetrack & Casino in the Cloverdale Fairgrounds and Northview Golf & Country Club https://t.co/kYOSx8S7nD
Today, Cloverdale, which is home to the Surrey Museum and the Surrey Archives, unique heritage buildings, and a quaint "Main Street," retains much of its historic ambiance. https://t.co/vba8GCF9gi
Flagship venue - largest indoor event space in Surrey, BC https://t.co/TdmOx73ns6
Cloverdale is particularly proud of being a filming site for the show; at its entrance is a sign which reads "Home of Smallville." https://t.co/f3uDsRZfas
Fraser Valley Heritage Railway: Car 1225 fully restored - Cloverdale, BC. This car ursed to run from downtown Vancouver to Chilliwack. Now it is being restored in Cloverdale. https://t.co/Prdrw2Whk8
